src:
Netizens LOL at a funny Hanteo Chart glitch making Oh My Girl's 'Banana Allergy Monkey' selling over 2 billion copies
01 Nov 2019, 15:28 by Yanderedan



On November 1st, a Keen-eyed netizen noticed on the Hanteo Charts that Oh My Girl's Banana Allergy Monkey has sold over 2.7 Billion units, 'making it' the most sold album in the world. 
Many netizens took to Twitter reacting to the funny Hanteo glitch
